metadata.description: As the Marvel Universe prepares for a massive assault by Thanos' armies, Spymaster and some of Marvel's best baddies decide that where there is chaos - there is opportunity! It's the crime of the century, an alien invasion is all the cover they need, and Spymaster has unveiled the perfect plan - so what the hell's wrong with Blizzard, and why is he having doubts? Frank Tieri, Ramon Bachs and Al Barrionuevo bring you a trip to the dark side, and the biggest score in the galaxy...it's the Infinity Heist!
metadata.name: Infinity: Heist/Hunt
